body: Got it. I think the PR was in the right direction, but depending on the `io_ops`, maybe in the wrong place. If it's a general bug in `io_ops`, then it should go there, otherwise, it should go in the wrapper code. The problem that I had was really about `./` which is not always portable. Do you want to resubmit the PR again?
